# Figure Labels
```{r, message=FALSE}


library(plotly)
f <- list(
  family = "Courier New, monospace",
  size = 18,
  color = "#7f7f7f"
)
x <- list(
  title = "x Axis",
  titlefont = f
)
y <- list(
  title = "y Axis",
  titlefont = f
)
plot_ly(x = rnorm(10), y = rnorm(10), mode = "markers",
	    filename="r-docs/figure-labels") %>%
  layout(xaxis = x, yaxis = y)

```
